          <title>
            <string language="de">Gute Krieger, schlechtes Eisen</string>
            <string language="en">Fine warriors, poor iron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bons guerriers, fer pauvre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerreiros finos, ferro deficiente</string>

          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Illustrierte Beschreibung zur Produktion von Eisen bei den Germanen. Schematische Darstellung eines Rennofens. Weiterführende Frage.</string>
            <string language="en">Illustrated description on iron production in Germanic times. Schematic figure of a bloomery. Further question</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione illustrata su produzione del ferro nei

            <string language="x-mt-el">Διευκρινισμένη περιγραφή στην παραγωγή σιδήρου στους

Περαιτέρω ερώτηση</string>
